summary: Contoso Wireless offers a wide range of TVs, from HD models to 4K models. Prices range from $299-$2,999. They are currently running a promotion where customers can get 10% off any TV purchase over $500 and free shipping on all orders over $300. All TVs come with a full manufacturer's warranty for one year and if something goes wrong, Contoso Wireless provides customer service to troubleshoot the issue and send a technician out to make any necessary repairs.
